data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Londt, Jason G. H., Dikow, Torsten (2018): A review of the assassin-fly genus Laphyctis Loew, 1858 with descriptions of two new species (Diptera, Asilidae, Laphriinae). African Invertebrates 59: 75-106, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.59.25022, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.59.25022
